work1.title: Front-End Developer
work1.subTitle: Fareastone Telecommunications Co., Ltd.
work1.describe:
Buliding web content and collaborating with Back-end Developers and visual designers
to build Big Data Marketing Platform, Monitoring System Dashboard, and 5G-Based Product Management.
Tool:
Vue.js, Vuex
Libraries for data visualization e.g., D3.js, Chart.js, Echarts.

work3.title: Front-End & Designer

work3.describe:
Buliding web content and creating web visual identity.

JQuery/ Vue.js, Vuex with Google Map Api, Baidu Map Api, etc.
